modName: 1st Cohort Companion and Optional Cheat Mod
summary: This mod adds several \"bodyguards\" at each of the vanilla houses, the Manor in Solitude houses 9 female companions.  There are also craft able God items, and craft able droppable gold coins craft able at the forge. I do plan on creating a non cheat version of this mod later.
descriptionHtml:
=================================Description=====================================
This is a small .esp mod that adds body guards (they don\'t have the god weapons or armors they have a weaker variant)  equipped with a variant of the Penitus Oculatus armor of the Legionary Praetorian, to each of the houses in the vanilla game. It also adds 9 recruit-able female companions in the Proudspire manor in Solitude that can wear any armor you give them (I set their default armor rating to 0). They are unfortunately not essential but I set them as Respawnable.

Please note that there are Cheat swords and armor craft able in game from the crafting bench. Penitus Occulatus armor God variants are craft able at the forge, and free gold coins/ ingot variants are also craft able at the forge.. ( i made gold coin variants just to have the ability to drop them and look at bling bling :D )

==============================Versions and Features===============================
V1.0 Companion & Cheat Mod
-Adds \"bodyguards\" to every vanilla player owned house in Skyrim.
-Craft able God Weapons and armor (Penitus Variants) (No items needed to Craft)
-9 Functioning Followers at solitude Proud spire Manor
-Craft able Droppable Gold Coins (No items needed to Craft)
-Craft able God Arrows (No items needed to Craft)
-Bodyguards and Companions set to Respawn (not tested)

V1.0 Companion Mod
-Adds \"bodyguards\" to every vanilla player owned house in Skyrim.
-Craft able Weapons and armor (Penitus Variants) 
-9 Functioning Followers at solitude Proud spire Manor
-Craft able Droppable Gold Coins Works Vice Versa
-Craft able God Arrows Requires Firewood
-Bodyguards and Companions set to Respawn (not tested)

=================================Disclaimer======================================
I am not responsible if this mod corrupts your saves or breaks your game. This is a small esp mod, and I doubt that it would, however use at your own risk.

=================================Story==========================================
..Story I made up that is completely fictional probably conflicts with lore xD (You may ignore) ...
You are the captured Commander of the 1st Imperial Cohort, each of the guards and companions in your houses are members of the \"1st Urban Cohort\" which was the first cohort sent into battle against the Dominion in the Imperial/Dominion war. When the 1st Imperial Cohort received word of the Imperial surrender, a large of portion of the cohort including yourself have disbanded in the lands of Skyrim. 

=================================Permisiions======================================
I am sharing this mod with you all, you can modify it, change it, or build your own mod with it! I spent a lot of time on it, and uploaded this just to save the trouble of someone else building a similar personal use mod... So feel free and modify change fix at no expense! :) Just have Fun!

=================================Recommended Mods==============================

JoO Imperial Praetorian 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=9205
-Replaces the vanilla Penitus clothes (bodyguards and followers will still be using vanilla clothing)
Separates the Imperial Praetorian from your personal Cohort :P

Increased Follower Limit
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12933
-Haven\'t tested myself, but looks good, and would be nice to recruit all nine Cohort followers

Multiple Followers Mod
http://forums.bethsoft.com/topic/1345602-wiprel-multiple-followers/
-Have tested and works really well.
